description.narrative: Strategies to address cross-cutting issues related to child rights are developed and applied throughout the programme of cooperation, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The Government of Bulgaria â€“ UNICEF country partnership meets quality standards in achieving results for children
